channel.title: Raid quit R-S
channel.description:
As some of you know Raid a R-S member quit because of a member causing him real life issues. Do you think that member should be banned because of his actions?
yes I know its weird for me to be on their side, but things like that should be dealt with in a better way.
As before it is censored for some reason, but change it to you know who. This is not advertising if some noob thinks it is this is a discussion on whether it was dealt with correctly.
* Link removed.

item.title: Raid quit R-S
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Since when have we kept allowing people to post links to that site and discuss it here? The site is censored for a reason. If another moderator has a problem with me locking this, PM me.

Read full topic
